mapper.insert: insert into event values(seq_ev.nextval, #{eTitle}, #{eStart}, #{eEnd}, #{eAnno}, #{eTarget}, #{eContent}, #{eWay}, #{eStand}, sysdate, default, default, default, #{eEventNum}, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{imPath})
mapper.select: select count(*) from event where e_status = 'Y' and e_division = 1
select * from event where e_status = 'Y' and e_division = 1 order by e_end
select * from event where e_status = 'Y' and e_division = 2 order by e_anno
mapper.insert: insert into reply values(seq_re.nextval, #{rContent}, sysdate, default, #{eNum}, #{userId})
mapper.select: select * from reply where r_status = 'Y' and e_num = #{eNum} order by r_num desc
select count(*) from reply where e_num = #{eNum} and user_id = #{userId} and r_status = 'Y'
